评论详情: This item didn’t work out. It was very large (I ordered a medium) and I was swimming in it. The material is thin, and the piece resembled more of a lab coat than anything else.  I would say only order it, if it’s not your main piece. And don’t size up!

评论概述: Not worth it and extremly small
评论详情: The prize is low, yes, but still I expected a little better. You can subtract at least 2 x from the size. I ordered 3xl which should have 50" breast. I have 48" normally and I could rip the 3xl apart easily.
Nice, looks great and got it early.  Only thing is it’s a little tight so go one size bigger
So thin and cheap and not true to size - 2 sizes too small

Although the material and stitching are cheap and the pockets are fake, the coat is true to size, lightweight and functions well as a Halloween costume or budget cosplay. This was additionally embellished with trim to resemble Fiyero’s coat from Wicked

This is a costume piece that can look good WITH EFFORT. Tailoring is a must for tall and skinny people. The material overall is cheap for sure but looks good and is easy to work with. The vest part of the costume piece is way too long and looked odd until I shortened it. Great item for experienced costume wearers
This fit like a glove for our St. Patrick's bar crawl. It does run a little big as I am normally an XL in mens, but the Large that I ordered was perfect!
Fine

Great quality, good enough for cosplay. I ordered a size up just in case, turns out the size chart is accurate and it fits a little bigger than expected. I advise ordering your same size or even one down.
didn't like it.  very "costumey" meaning thin and made very "meh"
It does the job, three times used
Not recommended.

评论概述: Quality sucks but it did the job.
评论详情: Ideal for just appearance, if you’re looking for more than that? Then maybe this ain’t up your alley.

I bought the red version 3 years ago and it was amazing. Such good quality and perfect for my Robotnik costume, it inspired me to buy the yellow one for another costume I'm working on, and let me tell you, the yellow version is awful, and thin, and cheaper quality than even costumes at Halloween. Totally Not worth almost $20 more than it was 3 years ago.
Im an adult size small/medium women. I got a youth size L and it fit me, the arms were a little short, but it was ok since I had puffy sleeves that need to stick out.
Handsome costume
I got this for my Oncler costume. Looks cool and fits perfectly.
would purchase again
Got it for my Oncler complaint fits well. A bit snug then I expected. I did notice the buttons were attached backwards, so they were attached like it's a womans. But not a big deal.
